mapper.select: select distinct c.dr_idx, c.d_idx, c.d_date, c.d_starttime, c.d_endtime, c.d_startpoint, c.d_endpoint, c.d_commute, c.d_fee from D_CARPOOL c join RESERVATION r on c.dr_idx = r.dr_idx where r_confirm='B' and c.d_date >= curdate() order by d_date desc

select distinct c.dr_idx, c.d_idx, c.d_date, c.d_starttime, c.d_endtime, c.d_startpoint, c.d_endpoint, c.d_commute, c.d_fee from D_CARPOOL c join RESERVATION r on c.dr_idx = r.dr_idx where r_confirm='B' and c.d_date >= curdate() and c.d_date =#{date} and (#{time} between c.d_starttime and c.d_endtime) and c.d_startpoint like concat('%',#{startPoint},'%') and c.d_endpoint like concat('%',#{endPoint},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION (p_idx, dr_idx, r_confirm) values (#{p_idx}, #{dr_idx}, default)
mapper.select: select r.r_idx, r.r_date, d.nickname, c.d_date, c.d_starttime, c.d_endtime, c.d_startpoint, c.d_endpoint, c.d_fee, r.r_confirm from DRIVER d join D_CARPOOL c on d.d_idx = c.d_idx join RESERVATION r on r.dr_idx = c.dr_idx where r.p_idx=#{p_idx} and r_confirm='Y' order by r.r_date desc

select r.r_idx, r.r_date, d.nickname, c.d_date, c.d_starttime, c.d_endtime, c.d_startpoint, c.d_endpoint, c.d_fee, r.r_confirm from DRIVER d join D_CARPOOL c on d.d_idx = c.d_idx join RESERVATION r on r.dr_idx = c.dr_idx where r.p_idx=#{p_idx} and r_confirm='B' order by r.r_date desc
